snippet.title: 【Touhou Mystia's Izakaya】Nintendo Switch Release Trailer
snippet.description:
＼A title that received overwhelming praise on the Steam platform is finally coming to Nintendo Switch™!／

◆Digital version now available on Nintendo eShop!
Nintendo eShop: https://store-jp.nintendo.com/list/software/70010000073907.html

◆Physical version (regular and limited deluxe editions) also available!
For details on store-specific bonuses and more, please visit the Phoenixx official website.
https://phoenixx.ne.jp/work/yosuzume/

"Touhou Mystia's Izakaya" is a restaurant management simulation fan game set in the "Touhou Project" universe, where the resident of Gensokyo, Mystia Lorelei, struggles to revive her own izakaya. The basic flow of the game involves procuring ingredients and communicating with residents of Gensokyo during the day, and operating the izakaya at night. Welcome various customers every evening, serve them delicious dishes, and strive to become the beloved izakaya of Gensokyo!

Developed by the Chinese game development team "Dichroic Purpilion," known for creating various "Touhou Project" fan games, this title that received overwhelming praise on the Steam platform is finally making its debut on Nintendo Switch™. "Touhou Mystia's Izakaya" for Nintendo Switch™ consolidates all downloadable content from the Steam version and fully supports Japanese, delivering an even more enjoyable experience than ever before.
Overflowing with love for the "Touhou Project" from every aspect of the game, whether you're a returning player or new to the franchise, we invite you to give it a try.

#Touhou #touhouproject  #東方プロジェクト
